DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine relative performance new daily disposable toric soft contact lens daily disposable toric contact lens currently available market , specifically regard comfort vision lens .
DOC.brief_title: Dispensing Evaluation New Daily Disposable Toric Soft Contact Lens .
DOC.criteria: The subject must 18 40 year old . The subject must normal eye . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must read sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT provide copy form . The subject must subjective distance spectacle prescription range 1.75 5.00D eye . The subject must manifest 1.25 2.00 D refractive astigmatism eye . The subject 's refractive cylinder axis must 180 degree plus minus 30 degree eye . The subject must adapt wearer soft toric contact lenses eye . The subject 's best visual acuity ( BVA ) must better equal 20/25 eye . Subjects must already possess wearable pair spectacle . Ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . Systemic disease autoimmune disease use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal stain abnormality cornea , may contraindicate contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) tarsal abnormality might interfere contact lens wear . Any ocular infection . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . Pregnancy lactation Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . Diabetes Strabismus
